issue.title: [CF 865] Dispel types not in suggestion list / not working for RU client?
issue.body:
Based on http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=4221

It seems that the dispel types aren't showing up in the suggestion list for ruRU clients, and it also seems that they aren't working regardless of whether or not they appear in the suggestion list.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #865 | Raw

comments.body:
I have tested this and I am unable to reproduce the issue described. This is what I see: http://i.imgur.com/qjs9WLu.png

It also functions properly.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
